home.title: Find Your Perfect Rental Property
home.subtitle: Discover amazing properties on our interactive map. Your dream home is just a click away.
home.citiesSubtitle: Discover properties available in each city
home.mapSubtitle: Explore all available properties on our map
home.featuresSubtitle: Everything you need to find or publish your ideal property
home.feature1Desc: Explore properties directly on an interactive map with all details at your fingertips
home.feature2Desc: Filter by price, type, region and more to find exactly what you're looking for
home.feature3Desc: Communicate directly with property owners through our real-time chat system
home.feature4Desc: Read authentic reviews from previous tenants to make an informed decision
home.feature5Desc: Save your favorite properties to review them later with ease
home.feature6Desc: Stay informed about new messages, reviews and important updates
home.howItWorksTitle: Find Your Property in 3 Simple Steps
home.howItWorksSubtitle: The simplest process to find your next home
home.step1Desc: Browse our interactive map and discover properties in your area
home.step2Desc: Use our advanced filters to find properties that match your criteria
home.step3Desc: Contact the owner directly via chat and finalize your booking
home.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of users who have already found their ideal property

auth.signInToContinue: Sign in to your account to continue
auth.signUpToContinue: Create an account to get started

recommendations.title: Recommendations for you
recommendations.subtitle: Properties selected by our AI system based on your preferences and history
recommendations.accessReservedMessage: This page is reserved for tenants. Please log in with a tenant account.
recommendations.aiPreparing: Our AI is preparing your personalized recommendations
recommendations.noRecommendationsMessage: Explore properties and add them to your favorites to receive personalized recommendations.

recommendations.howItWorksSubtitle: Our AI system uses several advanced algorithms to suggest the best properties for you
recommendations.collaborativeFilteringDesc: We analyze preferences of similar users to suggest properties to you.
recommendations.contentBasedFilteringDesc: We find properties similar to those you have liked.
recommendations.explicitPreferencesDesc: We take into account your preferred region and maximum budget.
recommendations.popularPropertiesDesc: We also include the most viewed properties recently.
recommendations.mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to see recommendations.
recommendations.accessDenied: Access denied. You must be logged in as a tenant.
